introduction.headline: Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to my website! Here, I share my passion for timeless music from the '70s, '80s, and '90s.

band.name: Michael Jackson
band.description: Michael Jackson (1958–2009), often referred to as the "King of Pop," was an American singer, songwriter, and dancer.

band.name: The Beatles
band.description: The Beatles were an iconic British rock band formed in Liverpool in 1960, consisting of John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, and Ringo Starr.

band.name: Queen
band.description: Queen, formed in London in 1970, is a legendary British rock band known for their theatrical performances and genre-blending music.

band.name: Madonna
band.description: Madonna, often called the "Queen of Pop," is a globally recognized artist known for her groundbreaking influence on music, fashion, and pop culture.

band.name: Nirvana
band.description: Nirvana was an American rock band formed in 1987 in Aberdeen, Washington, by Kurt Cobain and Krist Novoselic.
